comments.creator: bjarne@runitsoft.com
comments.author: bjarne@runitsoft.com
comments.raw_text: In some (rare?) cases the cache cannot satisfy the storage-policy for cache-entries required by necko. Our current implementation deals really inefficiently with this since it is assumed that this happens rarely. We should collect some data to back up this assumption...
comments.text: In some (rare?) cases the cache cannot satisfy the storage-policy for cache-entries required by necko. Our current implementation deals really inefficiently with this since it is assumed that this happens rarely. We should collect some data to back up this assumption...
